trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> namespace provides classes that allow you to write custom installers for your own components.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> 命名空间提供类，这些类使您可以为自己的组件编写自定义安装程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> class is the base class for all custom installers in the.NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> 类是 .NET Framework 中所有自定义安装程序的基类。

trans-unit.source: Through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property, an installer contains a collection of other installers as children.
trans-unit.target: 通过<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>属性，安装程序包含其他程序作为子级的集合。

trans-unit.source: As the installer is executed, it cycles through its children and calls <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 执行安装程序时，它会循环访问其子级，并调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an object in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 有关中的某个对象的示例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>集合，请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property contains information about the installation.

For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file that saves information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: 例如，安装过程中，将保存所需的信息的文件的位置的日志文件的位置信息<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法，并运行可执行安装文件时输入的命令行。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an installation executable, see [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: 执行安装文件的示例，请参阅[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods are not always called on the same instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法不会对同一个实例始终调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might use an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> to install and commit an application, and then release the reference to that <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能使用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>以安装和提交应用程序，然后释放对该<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>。

trans-unit.source: Later, uninstalling the application creates a new reference to an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, which means that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method is called on a different instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: 更高版本，卸载应用程序创建的新引用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>，这意味着，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>的不同实例上调用方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, do not save the state of a computer in an installer.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因，不保存计算机的状态在安装程序。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that is preserved across calls and passed into the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，它是调用之间保留并传递到<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法。
